newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU says may change sugar rebate basis next week.
newsitem.headline: EU says may change sugar rebate basis next week.

text.p: The European Union is likely to change the basis of its sugar export rebate calculation next week, a European Commission sugar official said on Wednesday.

The official was speaking after traders in London said there was market disagreement over whether the EU would move today to the December Matif futures contract, from the October position, to calculate the weekly restitution.
"I would not be surprised if we move next week...if not, definitely the week after," the official said ahead of a weekly white sugar export tender.
The official said the EU was unlikely to move today to the December contract because the London and Paris futures markets were not yet in line.
The official noted there had been little demand for export certificates recently with only 90,000 tonnes approved in August, compared with around 240,000 in the year-ago period.
